Paragraph: Sequential cleavage of the precursor protein pre - pro - opiomelanocortin ( POMC ) generates the melanocortin peptides adrenocorticotrophin ( ACTH ) , melanocyte - stimulating hormones ( MSH ) alpha , beta and gamma as well as the opioid - receptor ligand beta - endorphin .

The paragraph is about the process of generating various peptides from the precursor protein POMC, including ACTH, MSH alpha, MSH beta, MSH gamma, and beta-endorphin. These are not diseases but rather hormones and neuropeptides.

The paragraph describes the production of several hormones and neuropeptides from the precursor protein POMC: adrenocorticotrophin (ACTH), melanocyte-stimulating hormones (MSH) alpha, beta, and gamma, and beta-endorphin. These are not diseases but rather hormones and neuropeptides.
